project.name: jing
project.description: Buildfile for jing + jarv + jarv-jaxp-bridge under java 1.5+ To build this you need to have a libs directory in the project root that contains the following libraries: jaxp-isorelax.jar (from bibtexconverter svn) xalan-j 2.7.0 (xercesImpl.jar, xml-apis.jar, xalan.jar, serializer.jar) saxon 6.5.5 (saxon.jar) available from http://saxonsf.net and http://xml.apache.org/xalan-j/

property.name: app.lib
property.value: libs/saxon.jar libs/xml-apis.jar libs/xercesImpl.jar libs/xalan.jar libs/serializer.jar libs/relaxngDatatype.jar libs/jaxp-isorelax.jar
